document_data.mainbody:
War Chief Hartusk was an orc warlord in the Kingdom of Many-Arrows in the late 15 century DR.
Hartusk was always a warmonger among the Many-Arrows orcs so it was easy for the drow under Tiago Baenre to manipulate him into ousting the moderate Obould dynasty in the  and starting a new war against the Silver Marches.
In the closing stages of the War of the Silver Marches, Hartusk was killed by Bruenor Battlehammer.
